shows.title: The Poetry and Music of Science
shows.desc:
Science is often seen as a knowledge-gathering exercise devoid of imagination. But Tom McLeish has listened both to scientists and artists and uncovered deep shared patterns in their creative process, joining with philosophy and theology in the longing to find answers...

Tom McLeish is an internationally-known academic leader in the ‘Physics of Life’, uniting biology and physics to gain molecule-to-ecosystem understanding.
